name: py-pyfaidx

variants.name: build_system
variants.description: Build systems supported by the package

description: pyfaidx: efficient pythonic random access to fasta subsequences

dependencies.name: py-pip
dependencies.description: The PyPA recommended tool for installing Python packages.

dependencies.name: py-setuptools
dependencies.description:
A Python utility that aids in the process of downloading, building,
upgrading, installing, and uninstalling Python packages.

dependent_to.name: py-mikado
dependent_to.description:
Mikado is a lightweight Python3 pipeline whose purpose is to facilitate
the identification of expressed loci from RNA-Seq data * and to select
the best models in each locus.

dependent_to.name: py-refgenconf
dependent_to.description: A Python object for standardized reference genome assets.

dependent_to.name: py-whatshap
dependent_to.description:
WhatsHap is a software for phasing genomic variants using DNA sequencing
reads, also called read-based phasing or haplotype assembly.

dependent_to.name: py-gffutils
dependent_to.description:
GFF and GTF file manipulation and interconversion gffutils is a Python
package for working with and manipulating the GFF and GTF format files
typically used for genomic annotations. Files are loaded into a sqlite3
database, allowing much more complex manipulation of hierarchical
features (e.g., genes, transcripts, and exons) than is possible with
plain-text methods alone.

dependent_to.name: py-refgenie
dependent_to.description:
Refgenie manages storage, access, and transfer of reference genome
resources.
